__e: River... in a completely sane world, is madness not the only freedom?
You don't see the world straight, River. That's your problem.
Well, Fall River's not so small.
Young lady, there's only one road and it runs right through Red River and I'm the Sheriff of Red River. Things starting to add up yet?
Leave Fall River and don't return.
No, I think things will glide a deal smoother for us... without River and Simon on board... but how long do you think they'll last?
It only takes a minute, there is far from River Street.
Up behind the old state hospital on River Road.
I know River Song of old.
This is River Song, back in her cell...
River Song. I could bloody kiss you.
